text: @MiaFarrow Very Good Ms Farrow, Every three day we witness the 9-11 attack on American soil with same numbers of causalties. It seems America is used to it or doesnot care. Me first and then the rest ........ Stay safe, wear a mask, wash hands ans social distance. #COVID19
